TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ListViewGroup extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class ListViewGroup Implements ISerializable

summary.span: 表示 控件中显示的一组项。

span.span: Represents a group of items displayed within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分组功能允许你创建的逻辑相关的可视化组项。The grouping feature lets you create visual groups of logically related items. 每个组由基于文本的标题后跟一条水平线和分配给该组的项组成。Each group consists of a text-based header followed by a horizontal line and the items assigned to that group. 您可以对齐到 left、 right 或控件居中的标头文本。You can align the header text to the left, right, or center of the control. 分配给任何组控件显示每当属性设置为值。Any groups assigned to a control appear whenever the property is set to a value other than . 组帮助用户找到它们正在寻找分隔到实用类别项的项。 groups help your users find the items they are looking for by separating the items into useful categories. 可以创建所需的任何类别。You can create whatever categories you need. 一个典型的方法对项进行分组的方式是进行排序。One typical way to group the items is by the way they are sorted. 例如，首字母的项目名称时按字母顺序、 排序或例如类型或通过单击详细信息视图中的列标题列表进行排序时的日期的子项时，可以在它们的项目分组。For example, you can group the items by the initial letter of the item name when they are sorted alphabetically, or by subitems such as type or date when the list is sorted by clicking a column header in the details view. Windows 资源管理器使用此类型的分组。Windows Explorer uses this type of grouping. 若要使用的分组功能，添加一个或多个对象添加到的集合控件。To use the grouping feature, add one or more objects to the collection of a control. 在中设置组标题文本和标题对齐方式构造函数中，将其设置或使用和属性。Set the group header text and header alignment in the constructor, or set them using the and properties. 通过指定中的组分配到组项构造函数中的，通过设置属性，或通过直接添加到项组的集合。You can assign an item to a group by specifying the group in the constructor, by setting the property, or by directly adding the item to the collection of a group. 所有项应都分配到组，才能显示。All items should be assigned to groups before they are displayed. 未分配给组的任何项目将出现在默认组，它具有标题标签"DefaultGroup{0}"。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 中不包含默认组集合，并且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它是主要适用于调试以确保所有项已正确都添加到组。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 项一次只能是一个组中。An item can only be in one group at a time. 你可以通过设置项所属组属性在运行时或通过将其添加到另一个组，会自动将其从上一组中删除的集合。You can change the group to which an item belongs by setting the property at run time or by adding it to the collection of another group, which automatically removes it from the previous group. > [!NOTE] > 使用组时，插入标记功能被禁用。The insertion mark feature is disabled when using groups. 这是由于分组功能通过组成员身份的项时，插入标记功能用于在重新定位拖放不排序其项的控件。This is because the grouping feature orders items by group membership, while the insertion mark feature is used with drag-and-drop repositioning in a control that does not already order its items. > [!NOTE] > 当你的应用程序调用时，组是仅适用于 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列方法。 groups are available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. 在早期操作系统，将忽略任何与组相关的代码和组将不会出现。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups will be ignored and the groups will not appear. 因此，任何代码都依赖于分组功能可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly. 可能想要将包含测试确定的分组功能是否可用，并且不可用时提供备用的功能。You might want to include a test that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，你可能想要提供备用排序时不支持按组排序的操作系统上运行。For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group. > > 插入标记功能提供的同一个库提供操作系统主题功能。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用方法重载，并传入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用分组功能，以将项目组织的详细信息视图中的子项值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the grouping feature to organize items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式是分组的类似于在 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在示例中，组是动态创建的。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列中，为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父项列中，为每个唯一的首字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 单击列标题对项排序成为该列创建的组。Clicking the header of a column sorts the items into the groups created for that column. 再次单击同一个列标题的组的顺序反转。Clicking the same column header again reverses the order of the groups. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何`ListViewGroup`可以将组织的应用程序中使用构造函数子项中的值的详细信息视图的项。The following code example demonstrates how the `ListViewGroup` constructor can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式是分组的类似于在 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在示例中，组是动态创建的。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列中，为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父项列中，为每个唯一的首字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 为每个列创建的组存储在子项文本或首字母以及一个哈希表中。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 单击列标题时，此文本值用于匹配项目到相应的列的组。When a column header is clicked, this text value is used to match items to groups for the appropriate column. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#3)]

The default is "ListViewGroup".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性，以检索标头文本或在运行时更改标头值。Use this property to retrieve the header text or to change the header value at run time. 此外可以设置的标头文本构造函数。You can also set the header text in the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来检索标题的对齐方式或更改在运行时的对齐方式。Use this property to retrieve the header alignment or to change the alignment at run time. 您还可以在设置标题的对齐方式构造函数。You can also set the header alignment in the constructor.

exception.span: 当设置此属性时，指定的值不是有效的 值。

summary.span: 获取一个包含与此组相关联的所有项的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection containing all items associated with this group.
A that contains all the items in the group.

value.span: 如果组中没有项，将返回一个空 对象。

span.span: If there are no items in the group, an empty object is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过指定中的组分配到组项构造函数中的，通过设置属性，或通过直接添加到项组的集合。You can assign an item to a group by specifying the group in the constructor, by setting the property, or by directly adding the item to the collection of a group. 所有项应都分配到组，才能显示。All items should be assigned to groups before they are displayed. 未分配给组的任何项目将出现在默认组，它具有标题标签"DefaultGroup{0}"。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 中不包含默认组集合，并且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它是主要适用于调试以确保所有项已正确都添加到组。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 项一次只能是一个组中。An item can only be in one group at a time. 你可以通过设置项所属组属性在运行时或通过将其添加到另一个组，会自动将其从上一组中删除的集合。You can change the group to which an item belongs by setting the property at run time or by adding it to the collection of another group, which automatically removes it from the previous group. > [!NOTE] > 项可以为中存在集合的组，但如果它不同时存在内的集合控件本身，则不会在控件中。An item can be present within the collection of a group, but if it is not also present within the collection of the control itself, it will not appear in the control.
